Package com.ibm.streams.management.job

Interface PePortMXBean

All Known Subinterfaces:
PeInputPortMXBean, PeOutputPortMXBean
public interface PePortMXBean
PePortMXBean provides attributes and operations for managing a processing element (PE) port of a Streams job.

Note: The job must be registered before accessing any of these attributes or operations. See InstanceMXBean.registerJob(BigInteger) for more information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    Field

    IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT

  • Field Details

    • IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT

      static final String IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TYPE

      static final String TYPE
      TYPE is used to identify this bean as a PE port bean when building the bean's ObjectName. The value is "domain.instance.pe.port"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getConnections

      Set<String> getConnections()
      Returns the connection identifiers for active connections for the port. The connection identifier can be used on the ObjectNameBuilder.peConnection(String, String, String) call to get the ObjectName of the managed bean for the operator connection.
      Returns:
      the connection identifiers.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getId

      BigInteger getId()
      Returns the unique identifier of the port.
      Returns:
      the port identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getIndexWithinPe

      int getIndexWithinPe()
      Returns the index of the port within the PE. This is a zero-based index.
      Returns:
      the port index.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getJob

      BigInteger getJob()
      Returns the unique identifier for the job containing the PE to which the port belongs.
      Returns:
      the job identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getPe

      BigInteger getPe()
      Returns the unique identifier for the PE to which the port belongs.
      Returns:
      the PE identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getTransportType

      PeConnectionMXBean.Transport getTransportType()
      Returns the transport mechanisms used to communicate across PEs.

      Note: This attribute is not included in the snapshot on a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) or a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) call if includeStaticAttributes is false.

      Returns:
      the transport type
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • retrieveMetrics

      Set<Metric> retrieveMetrics()
      Retrieves the metric information and values for the PE port. A metric is a measurement of an element associated with the PE port.
      Returns:
      the set of metrics for the PE port.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
      See Also:
      • Metric
      • InstanceMXBean.retrieveJobSystemMetricMetadata()
